about_the_game:
Step into a shattered solar system in Adventures Of Carson: Fractured Continuum, a 2D rogue-lite action-platformer. Take advantage of an expansive array of weapons and abilities as you fight through constantly changing planets devastated by space and time in the Infractus Tempestas system. Die and face the most dangerous enemy, yourself.

  • An Ever-changing array of planets with a new adventure awaiting each time you play.

    The Infractus Tempestas system is an ever changing solar system where each playthrough begets a new adventure. Each time you fall to an enemy a new 2D world awaits you. But, beware the haunting visage of your fallen self awaits you where you perished.

  • Caught In a Time-loop, Carson cannot die.

    The Adventures of Carson: Fractured Continuum follows Carson. The brave explorer who must discover why time and space has been fractured in the Infractus Tempestas system. Each time Carson fails in his mission he is sent back in time to the moment he entered the solar system. Carson may die, but he keeps his abilities and skills he learns before his death. Making him more and more dangerous with each death he suffers.

  • Fighting to the death is better with a friend.

    Time and space is fractured in the Infractus Tempestas system. Carsons from an infinite amount of universes are there to aid you in your fight to save the system. Invite your friends to help you on your journey where they can fight side-by-side with you. Be careful though, your friends can do just as much damage to you as they can the enemy. Choose your friends wisely.

  • Take advantage of the environment to defeat foes.

    Use the ever-changing landscape to your advantage to defeat enemies using fallen trees, loose boulders, or even shallow pools of water. 

  • Difficult, but rewarding souls-like combat.

    Your enemy is faster and stronger than you, but with enough skill and even more deaths you will become strong enough to vanquish your enemy.

content_descriptors.notes: This is a 2D action-platformer where you play as Carson. A famed explorer trying to save the Infractus Tempestas system from a fracture space-time continuum. Players will face brutal fantastical enemies. When defeated enemies and players may be cut into pieces and blood splatters may explode from them. Acts of intense and comedic violence appear numerous times throughout the game.
